definition: to prevent/to guard against/to take precautions
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: And they protect against soil erosion by holding moisture in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 樹木還能保持水分防止土壤侵蝕。

sentences.english: Sufficient space should be given to avoid mix-ups and cross-contamination.
sentences.chinese: 留有足夠的空間以防止混批和交叉污染。

sentences.english: Minimizes penetration, which may help prevent burn-through on thin materials.
sentences.chinese: 最小滲透，這可能有助於防止燒透過薄材料。

sentences.english: Industrial machinery or to prevent oil pollution on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 工業上可防止機械或地面上的油污染。

sentences.english: Mr Yettaw, who has been ill since his arrest in Burma, wore the mask to guard against infection.
sentences.chinese: 他在緬甸被捕以後，染病戴着口罩是爲了防止感染。

sentences.english: In any event, protecting yourself against such a case is relatively easy.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，防止自己攤上這種官司相對比較容易。

sentences.english: And the pump has a wooden handle to prevent burns to the hands.
sentences.chinese: 而且抽氣筒還安有一個木製的把手用來防止手被燙傷。

sentences.english: To prevent avalanches , Park Rangers and Ski Slope managers do what?
sentences.chinese: 爲了防止雪崩，公園看守者們和滑雪場經理們做什麼？

sentences.english: They treat their seeds with a fungicide to combat seedling diseases.
sentences.chinese: 真菌劑浸泡種子來防止秧苗受病。

sentences.english: They're also used to kill bacteria and prevent botulism.
sentences.chinese: 它們亦用於殺菌以及防止肉毒中毒。

sentences.english: If it is not valid, the tool prevents you from completing the operation.
sentences.chinese: 如它是無效的，那麼工具就可以防止您完成操作了。

sentences.english: No approach to the equipment by any child and non-operator.
sentences.chinese: 防止兒童和非機器操作人員接觸或接近本設備。

sentences.english: They powdered it to prevent further harm.
sentences.chinese: 他們給它抹上粉，防止進一步破壞。

sentences.english: Moderate shade can protect shade endurance plants from photooxidation injury.
sentences.chinese: 適度遮蔭可以有效的防止耐蔭植物發生光氧化傷害。

sentences.english: In the germ-filled world, however, preventing infection is a matter of life and death.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在胚胎孕育中，防止感染就是生死攸關的問題。

definition: (so as) to avoid/to prevent/(just) in case
to avert/to prevent/to avoid/to refrain from
in order to avoid/so as not to
to prevent/to take precautions against/to protect/to guard against/precautionary/prophylactic
to take note of/to pay attention to
to take strict precautions/on your guard
to be on guard/wariness/to guard against/preventive
guarantee/to guarantee/to ensure/to safeguard/to pledge/CL:個|个[ge4]
to defer/to postpone/to put off/to retard/to slow sth down
